projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: Stay informed with this sleek, straightforward weather dashboard. Powered by Open Weather Map API, it offers real-time updates and a four-day forecast. Access current conditions and plan ahead confidently with this user-friendly app

projects.name: Music Releases
projects.description: Explore the latest music releases with ease on this intuitive React-powered web page using Spotify's API. Discover new albums and singles in a user-friendly interface designed for music enthusiasts. Stay updated on music trends effortlessly with this interactive platform.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: Dive into React with a Twitter-inspired project, exploring state management and replicating Twitter's functionality for real-time interactions, updates, and trending topics.

projects.name: React Survey
projects.description: Embark on a React journey with our customizable survey form project, focusing on state management and form control. Upon submission, users receive a comprehensive summary. Designed with accessibility in mind, it ensures a user-friendly experience for all.
